cast.overview: In the late 1950s and early '60s, artist Walter Keane achieves unbelievable fame and success with portraits of saucer-eyed waifs. However, no one realizes that his wife, Margaret, is the real painter behind the brush. Although Margaret is horrified to learn that Walter is passing off her work as his own, she is too meek to protest too loudly. It isn't until the Keanes' marriage comes to an end and a lawsuit follows that the truth finally comes to light.
cast.title: Big Eyes

cast.overview: Four interwoven stories that occur on Halloween: an everyday high school principal has a secret life as a serial killer; a college virgin might have just met the one guy for her; a group of teenagers pull a mean prank, and a bitter old recluse receives an uninvited guest.
cast.title: Trick 'r Treat

cast.original_title: The Art of Racing in the Rain
cast.overview: A family dog – with a near-human soul and a philosopher's mind – evaluates his life through the lessons learned by his human owner, a race-car driver.
cast.title: The Art of Racing in the Rain

details.biography: Matthew Kevin Anderson is an American-Canadian actor. He lives in Toronto, ON, Canada.
details.name: Matthew Kevin Anderson
details.place_of_birth: Westlake Village, Los Angeles, California, USA
